org.apache.tomcat.jni.Error

  • 使用Error的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.tomcat.jni  

    • org.apache.tomcat.jni中Error的使用

      抛出Error的org.apache.tomcat.jni中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static long Shm.attach(java.lang.String filename, long pool)
      Attach to a shared memory segment that was created by another process.
      static long Lock.childInit(java.lang.String fname, long pool)
      Re-open a mutex in a child process.
      static long Global.childInit(java.lang.String fname, long pool)
      Re-open a mutex in a child process.
      static long Poll.create(int size, long p, int flags, long ttl)
      Setup a pollset object.
      static long Registry.create(int root, java.lang.String name, int sam, long pool)
      Create or open a Registry Key.
      static long Procattr.create(long cont)
      Create and initialize a new procattr variable
      static long Mmap.create(long file, long offset, long size, int flag, long pool)
      Create a new mmap'ed file out of an existing APR file.
      static long Shm.create(long reqsize, java.lang.String filename, long pool)
      Create and make accessible a shared memory segment.
      static long Lock.create(java.lang.String fname, int mech, long pool)
      Create and initialize a mutex that can be used to synchronize processes.
      static long Global.create(java.lang.String fname, int mech, long pool)
      Create and initialize a mutex that can be used to synchronize both processes and threads.
      static long Mmap.dup(long mmap, long pool)
      Duplicate the specified MMAP.
      static long File.dup(long newFile, long oldFile, long pool)
      Duplicate the specified file descriptor.
      static java.lang.String[] Registry.enumKeys(long key)
      Enumerate the Registry subkeys
      static java.lang.String[] Registry.enumValues(long key)
      Enumerate the Registry values
      static int File.getc(long thefile)
      Read a character from the specified file.
      static java.lang.String[] Registry.getValueA(long key, java.lang.String name)
      Get the Registry value for REG_MULTI_SZ
      static byte[] Registry.getValueB(long key, java.lang.String name)
      Get the Registry value for REG_BINARY
      static int Registry.getValueI(long key, java.lang.String name)
      Get the Registry value for REG_DWORD
      static long Registry.getValueJ(long key, java.lang.String name)
      Get the Registry value for REG_QWORD or REG_DWORD
      static java.lang.String Registry.getValueS(long key, java.lang.String name)
      Get the Registry value for REG_SZ or REG_EXPAND_SZ
      static long User.gid(java.lang.String groupname, long p)
      Get the groupid for a specified group name This function is available only if APR_HAS_USER is defined.
      static long User.gidCurrent(long p)
      Get the groupid of the calling process This function is available only if APR_HAS_USER is defined.
      static java.lang.String User.groupname(long groupid, long p)
      Get the group name for a specified groupid This function is available only if APR_HAS_USER is defined.
      static java.lang.String User.homepath(java.lang.String username, long p)
      Get the home directory for the named user This function is available only if APR_HAS_USER is defined.
      static long File.mktemp(java.lang.String templ, int flags, long pool)
      Open a temporary file
      static long Mmap.offset(long mm, long offset)
      Move the pointer into the mmap'ed file to the specified offset.
      static long Registry.open(int root, java.lang.String name, int sam, long pool)
      Opens the specified Registry Key.
      static long File.open(java.lang.String fname, int flag, int perm, long pool)
      Open the specified file.
      static long Directory.open(java.lang.String dirname, long pool)
      Open the specified directory.
      static long File.pipeTimeoutGet(long thepipe)
      Get the timeout value for a pipe or manipulate the blocking state.
      static long File.seek(long thefile, int where, long offset)
      Move the read/write file offset to a specified byte within a file.
      static long User.uid(java.lang.String username, long p)
      Get the userid for the specified username This function is available only if APR_HAS_USER is defined.
      static long User.uidCurrent(long p)
      Get the userid (and groupid) of the calling process This function is available only if APR_HAS_USER is defined.
      static long User.usergid(java.lang.String username, long p)
      Get the groupid for the specified username This function is available only if APR_HAS_USER is defined.
      static java.lang.String User.username(long userid, long p)
      Get the user name for a specified userid This function is available only if APR_HAS_USER is defined.
